Stuff I've been building

Quik

A high concurrency, strongly typed, high level, general purpose programming language.

Plaain

A serverless web app to organize & stream your media library from anywhere.

Tip the World Cup

An app to tip and follow the 2018 FIFA World Cup with friends & family including live scores.

Aww-some libraries

acts_as_favoritor

A Rubygem to add Favorite, Follow, Vote, etc. functionality to ActiveRecord models.

turbolinks-animate

A JavaScript library to add rich & adaptive animations to apps using Turbolinks.

notifications-rails

The most powerful (cross-platform) notifications handler & pusher API for Rails.
